name: Irackant
content: Irackant was a male Mon Calamari who worked as a bounty hunter around the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War, hunting down Imperial war criminals. Irackant flew the GAT-12 Skipray Blastboat Krakana's Claw and carried out extensive modifications to the vessel, inlcuding an alteration to the ship's environmental systems, to give the Krakana's Claw a more moist atmosphere.
